item.name: update with destroy of existing address

exec: // This will be moved to subscribers, or a setup url, or authorizer

graphql.query:
query listChildren($clientUuid: ID!, $searchKey: String, $offset: Int, $limit: Int) {
  children(clientUuid: $clientUuid, searchKey: $searchKey, offset: $offset, limit: $limit) {
    id
    uuid
    lastName
    middleName
    firstName
    gender
    dob
    livesWith
    email
    createdBy
    updatedBy
    createdAt
    updatedAt

    address{
      id
      addressableId
      addressableType
      addressLine1
      addressLine2
      city
      state
      postcode
      createdBy
      updatedBy
    }

    phoneContacts{
      id
      ordinality
      phoneNumber
      phoneExtension
      phoneType
      notOkayToLeaveMessage
      createdBy
      updatedBy
    }

    clientChildren {
      uuid
      clientId
      caseId
      relationship
    }
  }
}

query showChild($uuid: ID!) {
  showChild(uuid: $uuid) {
    uuid
    lastName
    middleName
    firstName
    gender
    dob
    livesWith
    email
    createdBy
    updatedBy
    createdAt
    updatedAt

    address{
      id
      addressableId
      addressableType
      addressLine1
      addressLine2
      city
      state
      postcode
      createdBy
      updatedBy
    }

    phoneContacts{
      id
      ordinality
      phoneNumber
      phoneExtension
      phoneType
      notOkayToLeaveMessage
      createdBy
      updatedBy
    }

    clientChildren {
      uuid
      clientId
      caseId
      relationship
    }
  }
}

mutation createChild($input: CreateChildInput!) {
  createChild(input: $input) {
    uuid
    lastName
    middleName
    firstName
    gender
    dob
    livesWith
    email
    createdBy
    updatedBy
    createdAt
    updatedAt

    address{
      id
      addressableId
      addressableType
      addressLine1
      addressLine2
      city
      state
      postcode
      createdBy
      updatedBy
    }

    phoneContacts{
      id
      ordinality
      phoneNumber
      phoneExtension
      phoneType
      notOkayToLeaveMessage
      createdBy
      updatedBy
    }

    clientChildren {
      caseId
      childId
      clientId
      relationship
    }
  }
}
graphql.variables:
{
  "input": {
    "clientUuid": "{{client_uuid}}",
    "firstName": "Juan",
    "middleName": "Jose",
    "lastName": "Dela Cruz",
    "relationship": "son",
    "gender": "Male",
    "livesWith": "other",
    "currentUser": "test",
    "email": "juan@example.com",
    "dob": "1997-11-19",
    "addressAttributes": {
      "addressLine1": "Test Address",
      "addressLine2": "Test Address",
      "city": "California",
      "state": "CA",
      "postcode": "1127",
      "currentUser": "test"
    },
    "phoneContactsAttributes": [
        {
          "ordinality": 1,
          "phoneType": "home",
          "phoneNumber": "+12345678901",
          "phoneExtension": "123",
          "notOkayToLeaveMessage": false,
          "currentUser": "test",
          "primary": false
        },
        {
          "ordinality": 2,
          "phoneType": "mobile",
          "phoneNumber": "+12345678902",
          "phoneExtension": "456",
          "notOkayToLeaveMessage": false,
          "currentUser": "test",
          "primary": false
        },
        {
          "ordinality": 3,
          "phoneType": "mobile",
          "phoneNumber": "+12345678903",
          "phoneExtension": "324",
          "notOkayToLeaveMessage": false,
          "currentUser": "test",
          "primary": false
        }
    ]
  }
}

graphql.query:
mutation updateChild($input: UpdateChildInput!) {
  updateChild(input: $input) {
    uuid
    lastName
    middleName
    firstName
    gender
    dob
    livesWith
    email
    createdBy
    updatedBy
    createdAt
    updatedAt

    address{
      id
      addressableId
      addressableType
      addressLine1
      addressLine2
      city
      state
      postcode
      createdBy
      updatedBy
    }

    phoneContacts{
      id
      ordinality
      phoneNumber
      phoneExtension
      phoneType
      notOkayToLeaveMessage
      createdBy
      updatedBy
    }

    clientChildren {
      caseId
      childId
      clientId
      relationship
    }
  }
}
